metadata.title: USN-5690-1 -- libXdmcp vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that libXdmcp was generating weak session keys. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to perform a brute force attack and obtain another user's key.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5690-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libxdmcp-dev - 1:1.1.2-1.1ubuntu0.1~esm1 libxdmcp6 - 1:1.1.2-1.1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
